title: 21-Day Energy Boost IV Package - Neighborhood Naturopathic IV Clinic
description: This 21-Day Energy Boost IV protocol can help you power through your day with energy to spare! Perfect if you're feeling sluggish.
cleaned_text: Package Feeling sluggish? Having a hard time getting through your day? Whether you have a big event coming up, or need a little extra support during a busy time, this energy-boosting IV protocol can help you power through your "to-do" list with energy to spare! $729 21-Day Energy Boost IV Package Benefits - Increase Energy: B vitamins such as B12 and B6 help form red bloods cells, and convert fat and protein to energy. - Increase Stamina: Taurine is known for increasing exercise capacity and stamina, while amino acids provide essential energy sources. - Reduce Fatigue: CoQ10 plays a key role in the production of ATP; our body's "gas". - Increase Focus: Zinc plays a key role in regulating neuron communication, essential for healthy cognitive function. Deficiency can lead to brain fog, memory issues, and exacerbation of conditions such as ADHD. Package Includes - 3 Energy Boost IV Infusions - 1 B12 Injection - 1 CoQ10 Injection - 5 Energy-Boosting Recipes (food as medicine) FDA Disclosure: The services provided have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. These products are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease. The material on this website is provided for informational purposes only and is not medical advice. Always consult your physician before beginning any therapy program. Any designations or references to therapies are for marketing purposes only and do not represent actual products.
